summary: Implements a handler that interfaces with OpenAI language models, builds and updates message histories, preprocesses prompts, translates system prompts to user format, compiles tool specifications, sends requests to the OpenAI API, and parses responses to support function‑call workflows, including decoding abstract syntax trees and execution outcomes.
business_intent: Provide a standardized component for the function‑call leaderboard that enables OpenAI models to be evaluated on tool‑use and code‑execution tasks by managing the full request/response lifecycle.
